  "latex" = "kableExtra",

)

options(
  knitr.kable.NA = " ",

  modelsummary_stars_note = FALSE,
  modelsummary_format_numeric_latex = "plain",
  RCTtoolbox.table_output = out,
  RCTtoolbox.table_fontsize = 9,
  RCTtoolbox.plot_family = "Yu Gothic"
)
